author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add a new hit collection for the newly proposed Totem T2 detector for the Run3 application

#### PR validation:

Tested with runTheMatrix.py and the new hit collection is tested with #29268 and a cfg file in SimG4CMS/Forward

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-sim62 Add hits for the new Totem T2 detector
